marker.ph: /// Role: BOMBERMAN - number of the bombs that can be placed on the same time. ...
/// Role: BOMBERMAN - countdown when the bomb explodes. ...
/// Role: BOMBERMAN - distance of bomb's explosion. ...
/// Role: BOMBERMAN - bomb max deploy count. ...
/// This class defines the basics of all characters in the game. ...
/// A reference to the character's animator. ...
/// Default number of the bombs that can be placed on the same time. ...
/// Maximal number of deployed bombs at the same time. ...
/// Explosion direction represented as array filled with X, Y coords representing the direction. ...
/// Deploy the bomb on the correct position. ...
